query: query FilmMovieListsRelations($filmId: Long!, $movieListsRelationsLimit: Int = 10, $movieListsRelationsOffset: Int = 0) { film(id: $filmId) { id movieListsRelationsPaginatedList: movieLists(limit: $movieListsRelationsLimit, offset: $movieListsRelationsOffset) { items { ...MovieListsBlockItemData __typename } limit offset total __typename } __typename } } fragment MovieListsBlockItemData on MovieListRelation { movieList { slug name movies(limit: 0, offset: 0) { total __typename } cover { avatarsUrl __typename } currentFilters { booleanFilterValues { filterId value __typename } singleSelectFilterValues { filterId value __typename } __typename } __typename } position __typename }
